task.summary: First implementation of the Speckle noise. Still buggy and not optimized.
Finished speckle noise. Added quick computations to it
Changed DS creation to deal with BW images
Continued modifying code to adapt to BW
Finished adaptation to Black and White pictures. Tested one training: better results
Created Jupyter Notebook to visualize results
Modified Speckle noise normalization so that it would not be bigger than data
Finished coding Speckle noise and bias. Added visualization function and few results and examples.
Included compatibility to 1ch and 3ch datasets, with a constant to modify.
Added .npy images integration for dataset. The images are now saved in classic format, rather than log if it's log.
The network takes 3ch as input in all cases. The validation images generation has been corrected
